reviewText: I finally received this DVD in the mail. I ordered it for my little cousin and I to watch, it is one of my favorite movies growing up : )
i was so excited when i was this was on DVD. one of my child hood favorites. very pleased with shipping and the movie was great too.
Childhood favorite! Love this movie! We have been looking for it for awhile and we're so glad we found it!

Was so happy to find this movie on DVD. This was my favorite movie growing up as a child. Now I'll always be able to keep it with me. Looking forward to being able to share this with my own kids some day.
I recently purchased this for a friend for Christmas and she LOVED it!  This is a good childrens classic that isn't only for kids, but adults who want to remember the "good 'ol days".

I've loved this movie since I was a kid and was thrilled to see it on dvd for one very important reason...SUBTITLES! Finally I was able to read the real words for the song Curdy sings! I've been trying to figure the words out for years.
Quite sad that it was scratched up given it was supposed to be very good, but it came in good time and only skipped for a moment.
I was so excited to find this movie! It's such a fun movie. I absolutely loved it as a kid, and now that I finally have a copy and my kids get to watch it, they love it as well!
So glad we found this. It was a favorite of minE as a child and now I share it with my daughters.  They also love it!!
Love this movie! I used to have it on VHS when I was little, and wanted to have a copy for my own collection. Very happy!
One of my favorite childhood movies!
Best childhood film ever! It came quick and just how i remember it as a child.
Good shape, fast shipping. Great for the price! Love the movie!!
